member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.ImageOcrRecognitionSettings
member.summary: Contains information about the image, where text must be recognized, and OCR engine settings, which must be used for text recognition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The image, where text must be recognized.
member.exception: Thrown if image or engineSettings is null.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The image, where text must be recognized.
The recognition regions, where text must be recognized.

member.summary: Gets the image, where text must be recognized.

member.summary: Gets the OCR engine settings.

member.summary: Gets the recognition regions, where text must be recognized.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType
member.summary: Specifies available types of recognition regions.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.Auto
member.summary: Region contains different content (text, images, etc) and must be segmented by OCR engine if OCR engine supports image segmentation.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.SingleColumn
member.summary: Region contains a single column of text of variable sizes.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.SingleBlockOfVertText
member.summary: Region contains a single uniform block of vertically aligned text.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.SingleBlock
member.summary: Region contains a single uniform block of text.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.SingleLine
member.summary: Region contains a single line.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.SingleWord
member.summary: Region contains a single word.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.CircleWord
member.summary: Region contains a single word in a circle.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegionType.SingleChar
member.summary: Region contains a single char.

member.name: T:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineManager
member.summary: Represents a manager of OCR engine.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: An array of additional OCR engines, which are used for parallel text recognition.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineManager.SupportedLanguages
member.summary: Gets an array of supported languages for recognition.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineManager.RecognitionRegionSplittingSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the recognition region splitting settings.
member.value:
- the recognition region splitting settings will be calculated using the method; otherwise, specified settings will be used.
Default value is .

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineManager.Recognize(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage,Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineSettings)
member.summary: Recognizes text in the whole image and returns the result as .
member.param: Image, where text must be recognized.
OCR engine settings, which must be used for text recognition.
member.returns: Result of text recognition as .

member.summary: Recognizes text in image regions and returns the result as .
member.param: Image, where text must be recognized.
OCR engine settings, which must be used for text recognition.
A image regions, where text must be recognized.
member.returns: Result of text recognition as .

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineManager.Recognize(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage,Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineSettings,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.RecognitionRegion})
member.summary: Recognizes text in image regions and returns the result as .
member.returns: Result of recognition as .

member.summary: Recognizes text in images and returns the result as .
member.returns: Result of text recognition as .

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineManager.Recognize(Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.ImageOcrRecognitionSettings[])
member.summary: Recognizes text in images or regions of images and returns the results as an array of .
member.param: An array that contains information about images, where text must be recognized, and OCR settings, which must be used for each image.
member.returns: Result of text recognition as an array of .

member.name: E:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineManager.Progress
member.summary: Occurs when the image is recognizing, to provide status on the progress of the recognition.

member.summary: Contains the settings for OCR engine.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: This constructor uses English language for text recognition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Language, which should be used for text recognition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Languages, which should be used for text recognition.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the language for recognition.

member.summary: Gets or sets the languages for recognition.
member.exception: Thrown if recognition languages are not specified.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the recognition region.

member.summary: The recognition region splitting settings.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Maximum width of the recognition region.
Maximum height of the recognition region.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrRecognitionRegionSplittingSettings.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The SerializationInfo to populate with data.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrRecognitionRegionSplittingSettings.MaxRegionWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width, in pixels, of the recognition region.
member.value: Valid value is any value greater than 1. Default value is 16000.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrRecognitionRegionSplittingSettings.MaxRegionHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum height, in pixels, of the recognition region.
member.value: Valid value is any value greater than 1. Default value is 16000.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrRecognitionRegionSplittingSettings.MaxWordSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size, in pixels, of the word.
member.value: Valid value is any value greater than 1. Default value is 3200.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrRecognitionRegionSplittingSettings.Default
member.summary: Gets a static instance of the class, which must be used if the recognition region splitting settings must be calculated automatically.
member.remarks: will calculate the recognition region splitting settings using the method if this value is set as a value of the property.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrRecognitionRegionSplittingSettings.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

member.summary: Populates a SerializationInfo with the data needed to serialize the target object.
member.param: The SerializationInfo to populate with data.

member.summary: Specifies available orientations of the OCR object on the image.

member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from bottom to top.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Results.OcrObjectOrientation.PageRight
member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from left to right. Used for latin languages.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Results.OcrObjectOrientation.PageDown
member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from top to bottom. Used for asian languages.

member.name: F:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.Results.OcrObjectOrientation.PageLeft
member.summary: Context (text) of OCR object is written on the image from right to left.

member.summary: Represents an abstract base class for optical character recognition engine.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.SupportedLanguages
member.summary: Gets an array of supported languages for recognition.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.RecognizeTime
member.summary: Gets an information about recognition time.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.RecognitionRegion
member.summary: Gets or sets the region on image which should be recognized.
member.exception: Thrown if bounds of new region of interest have negative values.

member.name: P:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.Binarization
member.summary: Gets or sets a that is used for binarization of the source image before text recognition.
member.value:
null - source image will NOT be binarized before text recognition;
not null - source image will be binarized before text recognition.
member.remarks: Text recognition performance can be increased if image will not be binarized before text recognition but this may decrease the text recognition quality.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.Init(Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngineSettings)
member.summary: Initializes the OCR engine.
member.returns: true - OCR engine is successfully initialized; false - OCR engine is NOT initialized.

member.summary: Sets the current image for recognition.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.ClearImage
member.summary: Clears the current image, which is specified by the method.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.Recognize
member.summary: Recognizes the current image and returns the result as .
member.remarks: Method recognizes text on image in the working thread. Use the method if you want to recognize text in multiple threads.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.Recognize(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage)
member.summary: Recognizes an image and returns the result as .
member.returns: Result of recognition as .
member.remarks: Method recognizes text on image in the working thread. Use the method if you want to recognize text in multiple threads.

member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Ocr.OcrEngine.Recognize(Vintasoft.Imaging.ImageCollection)
member.summary: Recognizes an image collection and returns the result as .
member.returns: Result of recognition as .
member.remarks: Method recognizes text on images in the working thread. Use the method if you want to recognize text in multiple threads.
